com.adobe.fd.ccm.ccr.ccrDocumentInstance.api.services

Interface CCRDocumentInstanceService


  • public interface CCRDocumentInstanceService
    CCRDocumentInstanceService interface provides various operations over draftInstanceCCRDocumentInstance which represents the temporary state and data as Document

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CCRDocumentInstance get(String draftId)
      Get API for the retrieving the data for saved draft.

      Get API for retrieving all the saved draft.

      Save API for saving the current dataXML of Agent UI.
